name: HireArt, Inc
description: Operator of a contract workforce platform intended to build the standard for easy contract employment. The company's platform offers employers cover every part of the employment process, from finding talent to screening and interviewing, onboarding, benefits, payroll, human resource support and outplacement, enabling clients and employees with the best contract employment experience.
one_liner: Operator of a contract workforce platform intended to build the standard for easy contract employment. The company's platform offers employers cover every part of the employment process, from finding talent to screening and interviewing, onboarding, benefits, payroll, human resource support and outplacement, enabling clients and employees with the best contract employment experience.
